original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color>$Skill_CD(2381)@ 引氣凝盾，在武將週圍形成球形龜甲盾，在接下來的$Status_duration(1511)@秒內減少60%物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color>$Skill_CD(2381)@ Yinqi Condensation Shield, a spherical tortoise shield is formed around the generals, which will reduce physics by 60% in the next $Status_duration(1511)@ seconds hurt.
